## ApiNamespaceAria2.tellStatus() method

This method returns the progress of the download denoted by gid (string). keys is an array of strings. If specified, the response contains only keys in the keys array. If keys is empty or omitted, the response contains all keys. This is useful when you just want specific keys and avoid unnecessary transfers. For example, `aria2.tellStatus("2089b05ecca3d829", ["gid", "status"])` returns the gid and status keys only. The response is a struct. Values are strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tellStatus<T extends keyof Status>(gid: string, keys?: T[]): Promise<Pick<Status, T>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  gid | string | GID |
|  keys | T\[\] | response contains these keys only |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Pick&lt;[Status](./aria2.status.md)<!-- -->, T&gt;&gt;

struct
